opis: KUĆA, PRODAJA, DUBROVNIK, ŠIPAN, 297 m2, 5-sobna Prodaje se kamena kuća na Šipanu, najvećem otoku Elafita. Kuća se sastoji od tri etaže : PRIZEMLJE : dnevni boravak s kuhinjom i blagovaonicom, spavaća soba, kupaonica, hodnik te vrt s ostavom KAT : dnevni boravak, kuhinja s blagovaonicom, kupaonica te terasa s pergolom POTKROVLJE : dvije spavaće sobe svaka sa svojom kupaonicom Kuća je izgrađena 1800.godine te je obložena kamenom. Kompletno je renovirana te opremljena klimatizacijskim uređajima za hlađenje i grijanje a postavljeno je i podno grijanje te ima i kamin. Površina dvorišta iznosi 117 m2. Prodaje se kompletno namještena. Kuća se nalazi na sjajnoj lokaciji prvi red do mora u Šipanskoj Luci na otoku Šipanu. Otok Šipan je površinom najveći i najudaljeniji otok od grada Dubrovnika u skupini Elafitskih otoka, te se do otoka dolazi putem trajekta i putničkog broda. S obzirom na mirnu lokaciju i predivan pogled na more, kuća je idealna kao investicija sa već uhodanim poslom. Vlasništvo uredno. HOUSE FOR SALE, DUBROVNIK, ŠIPAN, 297 m², 5 Rooms A stone house is for sale on Šipan, the largest island of the Elaphiti archipelago. The house consists of three floors: - Ground floor: living room with kitchen and dining area, bedroom, bathroom, hallway, and a garden with a storage area. - First floor: living room, kitchen with dining area, bathroom, and a terrace with a pergola. - Attic: two bedrooms, each with its own bathroom. The house was built in 1800 and is clad in stone. It has been completely renovated and equipped with air conditioning for cooling and heating, as well as underfloor heating and a fireplace. The courtyard area is 117 m². The house is sold fully furnished. It is located in a prime location, right on the seafront in Šipanska Luka on the island of Šipan. Šipan is the largest and most remote island from Dubrovnik in the Elaphiti group, and it is accessible by ferry and passenger boat. Given its peaceful location and stunning sea views, the house is an ideal investment with an already established business. Ownership is clear.
